***Under Construction***

TraitDescriptionAnima Cost
Fire LoreThis increases power of Fire attacks. This also decreases damage inflicted by Fire attacks.1500
Water LoreThis increases power of Water attacks. This also decreases damage inflicted by Water attacks.1500
Wind LoreThis increases power of Wind attacks. This also decreases damage inflicted by Wind attacks.1500
Earth LoreThis increases power of Earth attacks. This also decreases damage inflicted by Earth attacks.1500
MettlePrevent an enemy from using a Trait. This is not effective against the Final Guts Trait.2000
PenetrationWhen a Skill is used you may use this to cancel out the effects of one of the enemy's Traits.2000
Strong HornThis is a Trait Beaklon-related monsters can acquire. It weakens the "Fear."1000
Dragon ScaleThis is a Trait Dragon-related monsters can acquire. It weakens the "Weakness."1000
Burning SoulThis is a Trait Garu-related monsters can acquire. It weakens the "Weakness."1000
Mech BodyThis is a Trait Hengar-related monsters can acquire. It weakens the "Curse."1000
Shine EyeThis is a Trait Maya-related monsters can acquire. It weakens the "Dizzy."1000
Flash EyeAn upgrade of Shine Eye,obtainable only by pure Maya. Monsters with this Trait are not affected by the "Dizzy."1000
FoolThis is a Traits Piroro-related monsters can acquire. It weakens the "Anger."1000
CrownAn up-grade of Fool, obtainable only by pure Piroro. Monsters with this Trait are not affected by the "Anger."1000
FlowerShieldThis is a Trait Plant-related monsters can acquire. It weakens the "Paralyze."1000
